contents: Changed the data source for website traffic statistics from Page Views to Requests.
After this update, the experience points on the top left will increase significantly.
The free claim for Pyroxene is now limited to once a day.
The amount of Pyroxene will no longer be reset after refreshing the page.
The initial value of credit points is fixed at 50,000,000, and gambling will cost AP for each click now.
The guide text has been updated to reflect the above changes.
Added C105 circle cut and Web Catalog link in the announcement.
Updated text in the message which appears when the site is updated.
Feature added to switch languages
Changed the font to support multiple languages.
The announcement page has been updated to integrate patch notes and announcements into the same page.
